items.sentence: I suspect Tom and Mary studied French together.
Tom is likely going to be back by October 20th.
Tom is living on an allowance from his parents.
Tom is much better today than he was yesterday.
Tom is no longer interested in buying your car.
Paramedics arrived on the scene within minutes.
I\'m not convinced you know what you\'re doing.
I thought you might want to see Tom right away.
I thought you said you were staying until 2:30.
I told Tom he was no longer allowed to be here.
There\'s a stack of comic books on Tom\'s desk.
I\'ll do whatever it takes to get my kids back.
I\'ll do whatever it takes to make that happen.
I\'ll get Tom to carry your suitcases upstairs.
I\'ll get my son to go instead of going myself.
I\'ll give these puppies to whoever likes dogs.
I\'ll give you a call as soon as Tom gets here.
Neither Tom nor Mary has begun studying French.
Neither Tom nor Mary has found a job in Boston.
No one can blame you for being a little scared.
